Metadata.title: Felipe Vaz - Portfolio | Front-End Developer
Metadata.description: Hi, I'm Felipe Vaz! A Front-End Developer passionate about creating creative and high-performance interfaces.

Header.title: Creativity & Purpose.
Header.subtitle: Exploring outside-the-box challenges with effective and technical solutions.

lines.2nd: Use ↑ ↓ to navigate and “Enter” to select a command.

About.content:
Fascinated by Web Development, I love turning ideas into interactive and functional interfaces. Since I started programming, I've been aiming to create solutions that break the mold, always exploring new ways to combine creativity and technology.

My name is Felipe, I'm 20 years old and I'm looking for my first experience in the job market. I believe programming goes far beyond code — it's a tool to innovate, solve problems, and impact people.
